#cloud-config
groups:
  - Ubuntu:[root,sys]
  - ftpaccess:[craig,ftpuser1,ftpuser2,ftpuser3]
package_upgrade: true
packages:
  - openssh-server
users:
  - default
  - name: craig
    gecos: Craig Srsen
    groups: sudo, ftpaccess
    shell: /bin/bash
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - ssh-rsa  csrsen@gmail.com
- name: ftpuser1
  gecos: FTP User 1
  groups: ftpaccess
  shell: /bin/bash
  passwd:
runcmd:
  - sudo service ssh restart
power_state:
 delay: "+5"
 mode: poweroff
 message: Bye Bye Now
 timeout: 30
 condition: True
